#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,arr[32001]={0},primes[100000],len = 0,a,b;
    for(int i=2; i<= 32000; i++)
    {
        if(arr[i] == 0)
        {
            for(int j=2;i*j<=32000;j++)
                arr[i*j] = 1;
        }
    }
    for(int i=2;i<32000;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i] == 0)
                primes[len++] = i;
        }
//    for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
//        printf("%d ",primes[i]);
    //printf("%d\n",len);
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        int num[200001]={0};
        for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
        {
            int md = a % primes[i];
            int tmp = a / primes[i];
            int j;
            if(md == 0)
                j = a;
            else
                j = primes[i]*(tmp + 1);
            while(j <= b)
            {
                tmp = j;
                int fac = 0;
                while(tmp % primes[i] == 0)
                {
                    fac++;
                    tmp/=primes[i];
                }
                //printf("num:%d fac:%d prime:%d tmp:%d\n",j,fac+1,primes[i],tmp);
                if(tmp == 1)
                {
                    if(arr[fac+1] != 0)
                        num[j-a] = 1;
                }
                else
                    num[j-a] = 1;
                j += primes[i];
            }

        }
        int cnt=0;
        for(int i=0;i<b-a+1;i++)
            if(num[i] == 0)
              cnt++;
        printf("%d\n",cnt);
    }
    return 0;
}
